AI Description: Goatools is a Python library for exploring the Gene Ontology and determining the statistical significance of GO term enrichment in sets of genes or gene products.
Core Features: Interpretation Of Gene Ontology (Go), Statistical Analysis Of Go Term Enrichment, Visualization Of Go Term Relationships, Integration With Biological Data Analysis Pipelines
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Python Library, Gene Ontology, Enrichment Analysis, Biological Data Analysis
